title: Script/Handwritten Font ID Please
content:
Hello,  
This is one of those one time posts... (I may need help in future, and I hope to help also...)  
Is anyone able to identify this font? Note the unusual single stroke capital T and the complex lowercase S  
This graphic was provided many years ago but not in a digital version. I am now looking to Supply a digital version to my boss and I am having trouble finding the name of the font.

Please help! :D  
Thank you all in advance, all advice much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tasmanias%20own_4249.png)
author: rudo1ph

comments.content:
Sorry, but given the variation in the repeating letters, I believe this is calligraphy, not a typeface.

The |T| actually more closely resembles an |I| in similar script typefaces

I agree with Kevin, it looks like calligraphy - not a font.  
If you are looking for something similar, you may like **[LHF Signkit Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235059/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letterhead%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=LHF%20Signkit%20Script%20-%20Regular&fid=b9c9fdac1cce1884f1239f72fcc52e96&fsize=60&text=Tasmania's%20Own&fit=1)** by Letterhead, but |T| is definitely different
